channel.title: How to put in a anti massing system
channel.description:
How do I put the system thing in that says "your going to fast noob" because I love that server that has that :)
Please post your answers.

item.title: How to put in a anti massing system
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

Guys, it is like so easy, here it is:

} else if((actionTimer >= 2) && (masser == 0)) { sendMessage("You have been caught massing"); sendMessage("You have to click 1 time every 3 seconds"); sendMessage("If you get 15 warnings you are banned you are on ( 1 / 15 )"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has been caught massing warning: ( 1 / 15 )"; masser = 1; } else if (masser == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has been caught massing warning: ( 2 / 15 )"; sendMessage("You have been caught massing"); sendMessage("You have to click 1 time every 3 seconds"); sendMessage("If you get 15 warnings you are banned you are on ( 2 / 15 )"); masser = 2; } else if (masser == 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has been caught massing warning: ( 3 / 15 )"; sendMessage("You have been caught massing"); sendMessage("You have to click 1 time every 3 seconds"); sendMessage("If you get 15 warnings you are banned, you are on ( 3 / 15 )"); masser = 3; } else if (masser == 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has been caught massing warning: ( 4 / 15 )"; sendMessage("You have been caught massing"); sendMessage("You have to click 1 time every 3 seconds"); sendMessage("If you get 15 warnings you are banned you are on ( 4 / 15 )"); masser = 4; } else if (masser == 4) { sendMessage("You have been caught massing"); sendMessage("You have to click 1 time every 3 seconds"); sendMessage("If you get 15 warnings you are banned you are on ( 5 / 15 )"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has been caught massing warning: ( 5 / 15 )"; masser = 5; } else if (masser == 5) { sendMessage("You have been caught massing"); sendMessage("You have to click 1 time every 3 seconds"); sendMessage("If you get 15 warnings you are banned you are on ( 6 / 15 )"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has been caught massing warning: ( 6 / 15 )"; masser = 6; } else if (masser == 6) { sendMessage("You have been caught massing"); sendMessage("You have to click 1 time every 3 seconds"); sendMessage("If you get 15 warnings you are banned you are on ( 7 / 15 )"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has been caught massing warning: ( 7 / 15 )"; masser = 7; } else if (masser == 7) { sendMessage("You have been caught massing"); sendMessage("You have to click 1 time every 3 seconds"); sendMessage("If you get 15 warnings you are banned you are on ( 8 / 15 )"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has been caught massing warning: ( 8 / 15 )"; masser = 8; } else if (masser == 8) { sendMessage("You have been caught massing"); sendMessage("You have to click 1 time every 3 seconds"); sendMessage("If you get 15 warnings you are banned you are on ( 9 / 15 )"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has been caught massing warning: ( 9 / 15 )"; masser = 9; } else if (masser == 9) { sendMessage("You have been caught massing"); sendMessage("You have to click 1 time every 3 seconds"); sendMessage("If you get 15 warnings you are banned you are on ( 10 / 15 )"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has been caught massing warning: ( 10 / 15 )"; masser = 10; } else if (masser == 10) { sendMessage("You have been caught massing"); sendMessage("You have to click 1 time every 3 seconds"); sendMessage("If you get 15 warnings you are banned you are on ( 11 / 15 )"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has been caught massing warning: ( 11 / 15 )"; masser = 11; } else if (masser == 11) { sendMessage("You have been caught massing"); sendMessage("You have to click 1 time every 3 seconds"); sendMessage("If you get 15 warnings you are banned you are on ( 12 / 15 )"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has been caught massing warning: ( 12 / 15 )"; masser = 12; } else if (masser == 12) { sendMessage("You have been caught massing"); sendMessage("You have to click 1 time every 3 seconds"); sendMessage("If you get 15 warnings you are banned you are on ( 13 / 15 )"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has been caught massing warning: ( 13 / 15 )"; masser = 13; } else if (masser == 13) { sendMessage("You have been caught massing"); sendMessage("You have to click 1 time every 3 seconds"); sendMessage("If you get 15 warnings you are banned you are on ( 14 / 15 )"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has been caught massing warning: ( 14 / 15 )"; masser = 15; } else if (masser >= 14) { disconnected = true; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has been caught massing warning ( 15 / 15 ) is now banned"; BufferedWriter bw = null; try { bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedusers.txt", true)); bw.write(""+playerName+""); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch (IOException ioe) { ioe.printStackTrace(); } finally { if (bw != null) try { bw.close(); } catch (IOException ioe2) { sendMessage("Error logging bans!"); } } } break;

Add it with your dummy’s etc.

Musicmad

Read full topic

item.title: How to put in a anti massing system
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

ill find mine, i got it somewhere.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 16, 2007, 03:29:41 AM[/size][hr]if(clicktimer == 0) { if(clicks >= 20) { if(warn == 0) { sendMessage("NO MASS CLICKING ALLOWED!"); warn = 1; clicks = 0; clicktimer = 28; // 7 seconds } else { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" is MASSING, tell an Administrator!"; warn = 0; } } }

i advise you to change the timers, because atm it still tells you your massing when walking >.<

Read full topic
